mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_rule SET name = #{name}, rule = #{rule}, remark = #{remark}
mapper.delete: DELETE r FROM tb_rule r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rule_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tb_goods WHERE rule_id = #{id} ) tmp ON r.id = tmp.rule_id WHERE r.id = #{id} AND IFNULL( tmp.count, 0 ) = 0
